question: As we drop the wineglass, what will happen? See image below.

answers.answer: The glass falls to the ground rapidly and breaks.
The glass falls, but friction from the wire slows it down, so it lands fairly softly.
The matchbox swings on the peg with increasing frequency, causing the glass to also oscillate while it falls. It lands softly.
The matchbox loops around the peg, preventing the glass from reaching the floor.
